sentences.en: a low level of educational attainment
Could it be said that it is impossible of attainment?
sentences.cn: 难道这是办不到的 吗 ?

sentences.en: Educational development is measured as a combination of attainment - adult literacy - and opportunity - enrolment.
sentences.cn: 衡量教育的发展则要结合成就(成人识字率)与机会(入学率).

sentences.en: Especially the attainment rate of ERP project is very low.
sentences.cn: 特别是ERP项目,成功率非常低.

sentences.en: Hence we may have to search for a suitable catalyst, to speed up attainment of equilibrium.
sentences.cn: 因此我们可能必须寻找一种适当的催化剂, 以加速反应达到平衡.
这个成就显得多么不得要领!

sentences.en: Not its attainment, nor its final definition, but its pursuit.
sentences.cn: 不是得到快乐, 不是给快乐下最终定义, 而是追求的过程.

sentences.en: The attainment of the success is not easy.
The combination of minimum and maximum is the highest attainment.
sentences.cn: 对客户的需求,即使是极小的,也要尽最大的努力.

sentences.en: The statute divides ozone non - attainment areas into five classes, depending on the severity of the pollution.
sentences.cn: 法令依据污染程度把臭氧 非 达标区划分成5类.

sentences.en: The wisdom of our sages and blood of our heroes have been devoted to their attainment.
sentences.cn: 我们圣哲们之智慧,我们英雄们之鲜血,都曾奉献出来实现这些原则.

sentences.en: There was improvement in the educational attainment of the population.
sentences.cn: 7本港人口的教育程度已有提高.

sentences.en: We can't exaggerate his scientific attainment.
sentences.cn: 我们无法估量他在科学上的造诣.

sentences.en: We congratulated her upon her attainment to so great an age.
We congratulated him upon his attainment to so great an age.

words.tran_cn: 可得到的；可达到的；可到达的

trans.tran_en: success in achieving something or reaching a particular level
